subject: Why MVC is so important
description: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

subject: Authentication vs. Authorization
description: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authentication means confirming your identity, where authorization means being allowed access to the system.
